@Covertly I need help with it, mind giving us a shout... Add KadianK4 on Origin.

I'll tell you how to fix it. Download the ME3 language fix from here. Extract the .tlk files into the CookedPCConsole directory in your ME3 folder. Delete BIOGame_RUS.tlk, and rename BIOGame_INT.tlk to RUS.

I'll be damned. It does work.

If you need it to work, check page 2. Too lazy? Download the Multi7 language fix here, go to BIOGame/CookedPCConsole, delete/rename BIOGame_RUS.tlk to something else, then rename BIOGame_INT.tlk to BIOGame_RUS.tlk

You'll launch the game in English, but you'll get an error "Unable to Authorize DLC" with the DLC names in Russian. Wait for the full US release tomorrow.
